text:
e="preserve">Abdul Mahdi Hadi (, 26 February 1946 – 26 September 2020) was an Iraqi coach and international football player. He also played for Al-Minaa from 1966 to 1978. He played for the national team in 1970. He was born in Basra, Iraq.
Hadi died on 26 September 2020 in Basra from COVID-19 at the age of 74.
